title: New Orleans Signage
content:
SO I took a stroll down in the french quarter:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021203842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/palace_canal2_4462.jpg)
Palace Cafe on Canal Street. I really love how tall and skinny the letterforms are. I wish I could have gotten a better view of the font. It's very elegant and classy Serif font!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021203842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Jax_millhouse2_4152.jpg)
Jax brewery. Here's a Serif Font. It has short and stubby looking letters kerned a litter wider apart than usual.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021203842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/oohlala2_4298.jpg)
Here's some very decorative handwritten font along with a serif font using small caps.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021203842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sherie%20amour2_6353.jpg)
Calligraphic script

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021203842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/voodooblues22_3475.jpg)
Here's a fun and modern san serif font. The letters remind me of bubble fonts
author: srquresh
